channel.title: I did everything... Not working for other players?
channel.description:
Ok, I followed the tutorial I will tell you everything.
[ul][li]Portforward - Done[/li] [li]DL JDK - Done[/li] [li]Set up variables for the JDK version - Done[/li] [li]Run the client - Done[/li][/ul]
This all worked out on XP but I am on vista now... I have no idea if I need to do something special for vista...?

item.title: I did everything... Not working for other players?
item.dc:creator: @vinku12 vinku12
item.description:
@vinku12 wrote:

i just tryed without no-ip but still cant log on… im confused… can some one help me?

Read full topic
item.source: I did everything... Not working for other players?

item.title: I did everything... Not working for other players?
item.dc:creator: @iKolli iKolli`
item.description:
@iKolli wrote:

You don’t NEED no-ip, vinku12, if your letting them connect directly to your IP address (not recommended).

Read full topic
